publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3761 Margaret Mitchell: 40th Anniversary of the Open University—That the Parliament congratulates the Open University on its 40th anniversary; notes that the university is the only one in the United Kingdom dedicated to distance learning and that the university currently has around 150,000 undergraduate students and 30,000 postgraduate students; further notes that 70% of undergraduates are in full-time employment while studying; recognises that the university seeks to ensure that everyone who has a desire to learn should have the chance, regardless of background and circumstance, so that people can gain new qualifications, find a better job, broaden their horizons and fulfil their potential, and thanks supporters, colleagues and friends across the education and skills sector in Scotland for the many achievements of the Open University over the last 40 years.

*S3M-3761 Margaret Mitchell: 40th Anniversary of the Open University—That the Parliament congratulates the Open University on its 40th anniversary; notes that the university is the only one in the United Kingdom dedicated to distance learning and that the university currently has around 150,000 undergraduate students and 30,000 postgraduate students; further notes that 70% of undergraduates are in full-time employment while studying; recognises that the university seeks to ensure that everyone who has a desire to learn should have the chance, regardless of background and circumstance, so that people can gain new qualifications, find a better job, broaden their horizons and fulfil their potential, and thanks supporters, colleagues and friends across the education and skills sector in Scotland for the many achievements of the Open University over the last 40 years.
